name: Menu.Root
description: A list of options that appears when a user interacts with a button.
description_zh: A list of options that appears when a user interacts with a button.

anchorPoint.description: The positioning point for the menu. Can be set by the context menu trigger or the button trigger.
anchorPoint.description_zh: 菜单的定位点。可以通过上下文菜单触发器或按钮触发器进行设置。

aria-label.description: The accessibility label for the menu

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

closeOnSelect.description: Whether to close the menu when an option is selected
closeOnSelect.description_zh: 是否在选择选项时关闭菜单

composite.description: Whether the menu is a composed with other composite widgets like a combobox or tabs
composite.description_zh: 菜单是否由其他复合 widget（如组合框或选项卡）组成

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the menu when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh:
首次呈现菜单时菜单的初始打开状态。
在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

highlightedValue.description: The value of the highlighted menu item.
highlightedValue.description_zh: 高亮显示的菜单项的值。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  trigger: string
  contextTrigger: string
  content: string
  groupLabel(id: string): string
  group(id: string): string
  positioner: string
  arrow: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the menu. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 菜单中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation.

positioning.description: The options used to dynamically position the menu
positioning.description_zh: 用于动态定位菜单的选项

typeahead.description: Whether the pressing printable characters should trigger typeahead navigation
typeahead.description_zh: 按下可打印字符是否应触发 typeahead 导航

events.name: escapeKeyDown
events.description: Function called when the escape key is pressed
events.description_zh: 按下 Esc 键时调用的函数

events.name: focusOutside
events.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component
events.description_zh: 当焦点移出组件时调用的函数

events.name: highlightChange
events.description: Function called when the highlighted menu item changes.
events.description_zh: 当高亮显示的菜单项发生更改时调用的函数。

events.name: interactOutside
events.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component
events.description_zh: 当交互发生在组件外部时调用的函数

events.name: openChange
events.description: Function called when the menu opens or closes
events.description_zh: 菜单打开或关闭时调用的函数

events.name: pointerDownOutside
events.description: Function called when the pointer is pressed down outside the component
events.description_zh: 在组件外部按下指针时调用的函数

events.name: select
events.description: Function called when a menu item is selected.
events.description_zh: 选择菜单项时调用的函数。

events.name: update:open
events.description: Function called when the menu is opened or closed.
events.description_zh: 打开或关闭菜单时调用的函数。
